content:
I must be tired, because this simple code gives different results to what I expected:

$i = 0;
$sum = 5 + $i;
dpm($sum);
$i++;
dpm($sum);
$i++;
dpm($sum);

It produces:

5
5
5

Whereas I was expecting:

5
6
7
It looks like you never update $sum, only $i. The line where $sum is updated only happens once and before $i is updated. If you had that in a for loop, it would probably work like you expect.
Yes ...or if you had a sum($i) function that was returning 5 + $i, then if you were doing dpm(sum($i)); it'd also work.
